mc.name: Crusade
mc.oracleText: White creatures get +1/+1.
mc.printedText: All white creatures gain +1/+1.

mc.name: Death Ward
mc.oracleText: Regenerate target creature.
mc.printedText: Regenerates target creature.

mc.name: Disenchant
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText: Target enchantment or artifact is destroyed.

mc.name: Eye for an Eye
mc.oracleText: Eye for an Eye deals X damage to the controller of the source of your choice that dealt damage to you this turn, where X is the damage dealt to you by that source this turn.
mc.printedText: Can be cast only when a creature, spell, or effect does damage to you. Eye for an Eye does an equal amount of damage to the controller of that creature, spell, or effect. If some spell or effect reduces the amount of damage you receive, it does not reduce the damage dealt by Eye for an Eye.

mc.name: Farmstead
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, you gain 1 life."
mc.printedText: Target land's controller gains 1 life if {W}{W} is spent during controller's upkeep. You cannot gain more than 1 life each turn through this enchantment.

mc.name: Green Ward
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green. This effect doesn't remove Green Ward.
mc.printedText: Target creature gains protection from green.

mc.name: Guardian Angel
mc.oracleText: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Until end of turn, you may pay {1} any time you could play an instant. If you do, prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to that creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: Prevents X damage from being dealt to any one target. Any further damage to the same target this turn can be canceled by spending 1 mana per point of damage to be canceled.

mc.name: Healing Salve
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: Gain 3 life, or prevent up to 3 damage from being dealt to a single target.

mc.name: Holy Armor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
{W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gains
+0/+2. {W}: +0/+1

mc.name: Holy Strength
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
mc.printedText: Target creature gains +1/+2.

mc.name: Island Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: If you would draw a card during your draw step, instead you may skip that draw. If you do, until your next turn, you can't be attacked except by creatures with flying and/or islandwalk.
mc.printedText: You may decline to draw a card from your library during draw phase. In exchange, until start of your next turn the only creatures that may attack you are those that fly or have islandwalk.

mc.name: Karma
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps he or she controls.
mc.printedText: During a player's upkeep, Karma does 1 point of damage to that player for each swamp he or she has in play.

mc.name: Lance
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has first strike.
mc.printedText: Target creature gains first strike.

mc.name: Mesa Pegasus
mc.oracleText: Flying, banding
mc.printedText: Flying, bands
mc.flavorText: Before a woman marries in the village of Sursi, she must visit the land of the Mesa Pegasus. Legend has it that if the woman is pure of heart and her love is true, a Mesa Pegasus will appear, blessing her family with long life and good fortune.

mc.name: Northern Paladin
mc.oracleText: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target black permanent.
mc.printedText: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroys a black card in play. Cannot be used to cancel a black spell as it is being cast.
mc.flavorText:
"Look to the north; there you will find aid and comfort."
--The Book of Tal

mc.name: Pearled Unicorn
mc.flavorText: "--'Do you know, I always thought Unicorns were fabulous monsters, too? I never saw one alive before' --'Well, now that we have seen each other,' said the Unicorn, --'if you'll believe in me, I'll believe in you.'"Lewis Carroll

mc.name: Personal Incarnation
mc.oracleText:
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Personal Incarnation this turn is dealt to its owner instead. Any player may play this ability, but only if he or she owns Personal Incarnation.
When Personal Incarnation is put into a graveyard from play, its owner loses half his or her life, rounded up.
mc.printedText: Caster can redirect any or all damage done to Personal Incarnation to self instead. The source of the damage is unchanged. If Personal Incarnation goes to the graveyard, caster loses half his or her remaining life points, rounding up the loss.

mc.name: Purelace
mc.oracleText: Target spell or permanent becomes white. (Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)
mc.printedText: Changes the color of one card either being played or already in play to white. Cost to cast, tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target card remains entirely unchanged.

mc.name: Red Ward
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from red. This effect doesn't remove Red Ward.
mc.printedText: Target creature gains protection from red.

mc.name: Resurrection
mc.oracleText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: Take a creature from your graveyard and put it directly into play. Treat this creature as though it were just summoned.

mc.name: Reverse Damage
mc.oracleText: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
mc.printedText: All damage you have taken from any one source this turn is added to your life total instead of subtracted from it.

mc.name: Reverse Polarity
mc.oracleText: You gain X life, where X is twice the damage dealt to you so far this turn by artifacts.
mc.printedText: All damage done to you by artifacts so far this turn is retroactively added to your life total instead of subtracted. Further damage this turn is treated normally.

mc.name: Righteousness
mc.oracleText: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target defending creature gains +7/+7 until end of turn.

mc.name: Samite Healer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent 1 damage to any target.
mc.flavorText: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

mc.name: Savannah Lions
mc.flavorText: The traditional kings of the jungle command a healthy respect in other climates as well. Relying mainly on their stealth and speed, Savannah Lions can take a victim by surprise, even in the endless, flat plains of their homeland.

mc.name: Serra Angel
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking does not cause Serra Angel to tap.
mc.flavorText: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

mc.name: Swords to Plowshares
mc.oracleText: Remove target creature from the game. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
mc.printedText: Target creature is removed from game entirely. Creature's controller gains life points equal to creature's power.

mc.name: Veteran Bodyguard
mc.oracleText: As long as Veteran Bodyguard is untapped, all damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures is dealt to Veteran Bodyguard instead.
mc.printedText: Unless Bodyguard is tapped, any damage done to you by unblocked creatures is done instead to Bodyguard. You may not take this damage yourself, though you can prevent it if possible. No more than one Bodyguard of your choice can take damage for you in this manner each turn.
mc.flavorText: Good bodyguards are hard to find, mainly because they don't live long.

mc.name: Wall of Swords
mc.oracleText: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Just as the evil ones approached to slay Justina, she cast a great spell, imbuing her weapons with her own life force. Thus she fulfilled the prophecy: "In the death of your savior will you find salvation."

mc.name: White Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
mc.printedText: Protection from black, first strike
mc.flavorText: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

mc.name: White Ward
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from white. This effect doesn't remove White Ward.
mc.printedText: Target creature gains protection from white.

mc.name: Wrath of God
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: All creatures in play are buried.
